notifications.title: New Achievement Unlocked!
notifications.message: Congratulations! You've earned the 'Resume Master' badge for generating 10 AI-powered resume bullets.

notifications.title: Daily Achievement Reminder
notifications.message: Don't break your streak! Log today's achievements to maintain your 12-day streak.

notifications.title: AI Career Suggestion
notifications.message: Based on your recent achievements, consider adding 'Leadership' skills to your profile. This could improve your job match rate by 15%.

notifications.title: Application Status Update
notifications.message: Your application at Microsoft has moved to the interview stage. Check your dashboard for next steps.

notifications.title: New Comment on Your Achievement
notifications.message: John Smith commented on your 'System Design Project' achievement: 'Great work! This is exactly what interviewers look for.'

notifications.title: New Feature Available
notifications.message: Try our new AI Interview Practice feature! Get personalized feedback on your responses to common interview questions.

notifications.title: Streak Milestone Reached!
notifications.message: Amazing! You've maintained a 10-day achievement streak. You're now a 'Consistency King'!

notifications.title: Resume Enhancement Opportunity
notifications.message: Your recent 'API Integration Project' achievement could be enhanced with metrics. Consider adding 'Improved performance by 40%' to make it more impactful.
